description:
Whistle, whistle. As festival music sounds in the background, the members of the tennis club change into shrine maiden outfits and help out at the shrine`s festival!
The four of them help out in earnest.
Kanae uses her ability to operate heavy machinery she learned in a past life to put together the stage! Wait, this isn`t a traditional music festival! It`s a music festival!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battles Without Honor and Humanity with Senpai
